Text:
Ok so i do everything you say, but when i open minecraft, i log in, then click play offline and it goes to the blue Mojang Specifications screen and either freezes there or the screen turns black and freezes there.  The command prompt says this:

########## GL ERROR ##########
@ Post Render
1280: Invalid enum


Can anyone help me please? I'd like to get this game to work before i purchase it.
your video card might not support opengl, or the proper version of it. check to see if u have a new driver for it. its up to you to install it
